Module com.calendarfx.app
Package com.serenitask.util.DatabaseManager

Class GoalTrackingDAO

java.lang.Object
com.serenitask.util.DatabaseManager.GoalTrackingDAO
public class GoalTrackingDAO extends Object
GoalTrackingDAO (Data Access Object) class for managing interactions with the 'goal_tracking' table in the database. Provides CRUD operations for GoalTracking objects, mapping between the model and database representation.

  • Constructor Details

    • GoalTrackingDAO

      public GoalTrackingDAO()
      Constructor for GoalTrackingDAO. Initializes the database connection and creates the 'goal_tracking' table if it doesn't exist.

  • Method Details

    • createTable

      private void createTable()
      Creates the 'goal_tracking' table in the database if it doesn't exist. Defines the table schema, including columns for goal ID, date, and completion status, with a composite primary key.

    • addGoalTracking

      public int addGoalTracking(GoalTracking goalTracking)
      Adds a new GoalTracking record to the database.
      Parameters:
      goalTracking - The GoalTracking object representing the tracking information to be added.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly added goal tracking record, or -1 if the operation fails.

    • updateGoalTracking

      public boolean updateGoalTracking(GoalTracking goalTracking)
      Updates an existing GoalTracking record in the database.
      Parameters:
      goalTracking - The GoalTracking object with the updated tracking information.
      Returns:
      True if the update was successful, false otherwise.

    • deleteGoalTracking

      public boolean deleteGoalTracking(int id, LocalDate date)
      Delete a Goal Tracking entry from the database
      Parameters:
      id - Goal Tracking ID
      date - Goal Tracking Date
      Returns:
      True if the Goal Tracking entry was deleted successfully

    • getGoalTrackingByIdAndDate

      public GoalTracking getGoalTrackingByIdAndDate(int goalId, LocalDate date)
      Retrieves a GoalTracking record from the database by its goal ID and date.
      Parameters:
      goalId - The ID of the goal for which tracking information is retrieved.
      date - The date for which tracking information is retrieved.
      Returns:
      The GoalTracking object representing the tracking information, or null if not found.

    • getGoalTrackingByGoalId

      public List<GoalTracking> getGoalTrackingByGoalId(int goalId)
      Retrieves all GoalTracking records associated with a specific goal ID.
      Parameters:
      goalId - The ID of the goal for which tracking records are retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of GoalTracking objects representing the tracking information for the specified goal.

    • getGoalTrackingByDate

      public List<GoalTracking> getGoalTrackingByDate(String date)
      Retrieves all GoalTracking records associated with a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which tracking records are retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of GoalTracking objects representing the tracking information for the specified date.

    • getAllGoalTrackingRecords

      public List<GoalTracking> getAllGoalTrackingRecords()
      Retrieves all GoalTracking records from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of GoalTracking objects representing all goal tracking information stored in the database.

    • constructGoalTrackingFromResultSet

      private GoalTracking constructGoalTrackingFromResultSet(ResultSet resultSet) throws SQLException
      Constructs a GoalTracking object from a ResultSet obtained from the database.
      Parameters:
      resultSet - The ResultSet containing data for a goal tracking record.
      Returns:
      The constructed GoalTracking object.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while processing the ResultSet.
